title: Ticket #4609: Add 'analyze' functionality to condor_job_router_tool
description: From the unfinished work in #4569, we would like condor_job_router_tool to provide an 'analyze' option similar to condor_q. This would look at the umbrella constraints, route and the JobAd in question and give insight into why the job doesn't match a specific route.
creator: blin
